text: Live from Memphis is a live promotional recording by rock band Wishbone Ash. The promotional recording featured only a few tracks and was only released in America. The entire EP was included as bonus tracks on the 2002 remastered version of Argus (1972). ==Track listings== ===Side one=== # "Jail Bait" - 4:57 # "The Pilgrim" - 10:10 ===Side two=== # "Phoenix" - 17:05 (also included as bonus track on 1992 US release of Live Dates) ==Personnel== * Andy Powell – guitar, vocals * Ted Turner – guitar, vocals * Martin Turner – bass guitar, vocals * Steve Upton – drums ==References== Category:1972 live albums Category:Wishbone Ash live albums
title: Live from Memphis (album)
